post:
Hello LowEndTalk!

[TNAHosting](https://tnahosting.net/) is happy to post our first LET offer. We've been in the game server hosting business since 2012 and we've recently started expanding to the OpenVZ market. We're always learning and appreciate any feedback. Nodes are currently located with QuickPacket in Atlanta, GA. 

**256MB SSD Cached**  
 * 1 IPv4. IPv6 available upon request  
 * 15GB SSD Cached Disk  
 * 500GB Transfer  
 * $1.24/m **LET50OFFVZ** [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=47&promocode=LET50OFFVZ)  

**512MB SSD Cached**  
 * 1 IPv4. IPv6 available upon request  
 * 25GB SSD Cached Disk  
 * 750GB Transfer  
 * $2.49/m **LET50OFFVZ** [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=34&promocode=LET50OFFVZ)  

**1GB SSD Cached**  
 * 1 IPv4. IPv6 available upon request  
 * 50GB SSD Cached Disk  
 * 1TB Transfer  
 * $3.49/m **LET50OFFVZ** [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=35&promocode=LET50OFFVZ)  

**2GB SSD Cached**  
 * 1 IPv4. IPv6 available upon request  
 * 75GB SSD Cached Disk  
 * 1.5TB Transfer  
 * $5.99/m **LET50OFFVZ** [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=36&promocode=LET50OFFVZ)  



Test IP: 170.75.152.134

If you have any questions or suggestions - post them below, hop on live chat, or open a [sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2)!
